title: Understanding the Question
text: The question asks for a method used to find patterns and relationships in large datasets. Think about techniques that involve analyzing data to uncover hidden patterns.

title: Consider the Options
text: Look at the options provided: Machine Learning, Descriptive Statistics, and Data Visualization. Consider which of these is most associated with pattern recognition.

title: Focus on Machine Learning
text: Machine Learning is a method that uses algorithms to analyze data, learn from it, and make predictions or decisions. It is often used to find patterns in large datasets.

title: Select the Correct Method
text: Based on the hints, the method primarily used for finding patterns and relationships in large datasets is Machine Learning.
